TV Talk Show Host Day celebrates all the dynamic and entertaining personalities of the talk show world! From late night hosts to morning show anchors, let's take the time to recognize the people behind the screens that make us laugh, think, or bop along. It's time to shine the light!

National Bologna Day is an annual food holiday celebrated every year! It is the perfect day to enjoy a classic bologna sandwich with your favorite condiments and sides. Celebrate the deliciousness of bologna and have a mini sandwich party with your family or sizzle up a bologna slice on the grill for a special treat!

International Artist’s Day celebrates the contribution and influence of artists around the world. It is an invitation to reflect on and recognize the skill and passion of artists in all forms- visual, performance, digital, music, literature, and more. On this day, let's pause to appreciate the artistry that shapes and inspires the world.

Celebrate National Chicken Fried Steak Day today! Indulge in a Southern classic with a pan-fried steak covered in a delicious and flavorful gravy. Enjoy this comfort food favorite any way you like; from breakfast to dinner, it's sure to satisfy your taste buds!

Bandana Day is an annual event celebrated around the world! On this day, people wear bandanas to show their support for a cause close to their heart, or to honor those important to them. It is also a chance for everyone to come together and feel united in a shared passion.

National Chocolate Day is a time to indulge in your favorite chocolate treats, from cookies to cake to candy bars! Whether you prefer dark chocolate or milk chocolate, National Chocolate Day is the perfect occasion to treat yourself and enjoy the creamy, sweet deliciousness of chocolate.

National Oatmeal Day celebrates this hearty, warm and comforting breakfast. Oatmeal is a nutritious dish that helps keep us full and energized all day. Celebrate National Oatmeal Day by trying out new toppings or adding extras like honey, peanut butter, or fruit!

National Checklist Day celebrates the importance of lists and checklists in day-to-day life. It's a day to make sure our lives are running smoothly and free from stress. Checklists help us stay organized and stay on track, so celebrate National Checklist Day every year and make sure you have all your ducks in a row!

National Caramel Apple Day is an annual celebration of the iconic treat! Enjoyed by both young and old alike, it's a day to indulge in a sticky-sweet classic, whether you enjoy it simply, covered in nuts, or dipped in chocolate. Celebrate today!

National Cold Cuts Day is an annual event dedicated to delicious, versatile deli meat. Celebrate with your family and friends by enjoying a variety of your favorite sliced cold cuts including bologna, ham, roast beef, and turkey. Enjoy them in classic sandwiches, wraps, or side salads - the possibilities are endless!

International Rescue a Cat Day is an annual event designed to raise awareness for cats needing homes. This special day encourages people to help homeless cats, either by adopting or volunteering at a local shelter. Together, we can make a difference in the lives of cats in need.

If Pets Had Thumbs Day celebrates the bond between humans and their furry friends. Let's take a day to imagine a world where our pets can talk to us and help with chores - with an extra special holiday touch. Today is sure to be an unforgettable occasion.

Happy National Snack Day! Celebrate with your favorite treats! Whether it’s picked from the pantry or delivered with door dash, enjoy taking a break from routine to indulge in a delicious snack. Everyone has their go-to favorite, so join in on the fun today and treat yourself to a guilt-free snack time.

Join millions of cheese-lovers around the world in celebrating National Cheese Doodle Day! Enjoy a delicious snack with friends and family or make it a solo adventure - whichever you choose, don’t forget to celebrate America’s favorite snack on National Cheese Doodle Day. #CheeseDoodleDay

National Frozen Food Day is a special day to celebrate all our favorite frozen treats! From pizzas to ice cream, let's thank the delicious frozen foods that make life and meals easier. Grab your favorite, throw it in the oven, and celebrate National Frozen Food Day!

National Cereal Day is a special day to celebrate breakfast's favorite food. Enjoy your favorite cereal with friends or family, and make sure to share it with your favorite furry friends too! Enjoy a refreshing bowl of cereal and celebrate this special day each year.

National Proofreading Day is an annual event that celebrates the important skill of proofreading! Readers everywhere take the day to check for errors and refine their writing. This important practice ensures accuracy and professionalism, and National Proofreading Day encourages everyone to take a moment to ensure the best quality work.

National Crabmeat Day celebrates the beloved shellfish with its sweet, delicate flavour! Today is an opportunity to indulge in all delicious crab dishes that can be found globally. From summer backyard barbecues to waterfront seafood buffets, it's the perfect excuse to savor the succulent taste of crab.

International Day of Awesomeness is a day dedicated to celebrating the amazing people and things in our lives. It’s the perfect time to show appreciation to those around us and give thanks for everything we’re grateful for. Let’s make every day awesome! #InternationalDayOfAwesomeness

World Plumbing Day is celebrated every year to raise awareness of the essential role plumbing and sanitation play in promoting health and wellbeing. It is also an opportunity to honor the international plumbing community and the work they do every day.

International Fanny Pack Day is a celebration of a beloved accessory that has made a comeback in recent years. With a focus on unique designs, this day is a time to honor the fanny pack and its style and practicality. Celebrate by donning your favorite fanny pack and showing it off!

Earmuff Day is an annual celebration of winter fashion and fun! On this cozy day, wear your favorite (or the most ridiculous) pair of earmuffs and go out and enjoy the snow. Have a snowball fight, go sledding, or just look cute in all your earmuff glory!

It's National Potato Chip Day! Celebrate with your favorite chips and dip – it's the perfect time to indulge in this iconic snack. Whether plain, ridged, cheesy or flavored, potato chips provide a salty, crunchy and delicious snack. Enjoy with your favorite sandwich, as part of an appetizer spread, or just straight from the bag – it's time to munch!

Buzzards Day is an annual celebration held in Hinckley, Ohio. It's a tradition that dates back to the late 1800s and honors a flock of buzzards who returned every March, symbolizing good luck and the renewal of spring. Enjoy live music, costume contests, delicious food, traditional crafts, and much more!

Happy National Panda Day! Every year, these furry black and white bears get their due recognition (and lots of love). Spend the day celebrating these lovable creatures, and their efforts in conservation and other research—we owe them more than just a day of celebration!

Campfire Girls Day celebrates the tradition and spirit of the organization, dedicated to building strong female leaders through fun activities and outdoor exploration. It's a day to honor the campers, past and present, and spread joy and friendship.

Awkward Moments Day is the day when everyone takes a break to celebrate moments that are embarrassingly awkward. From uncomfortable silences to accidental trips, it's a day to laugh and take the edge off of those embarrassing moments.

Certified Nurses Day is celebrated annually to recognize the invaluable contributions of nurses to healthcare. Its purpose is to gain acknowledgment and respect for the profession of nursing, as well as to honor the dedication and commitment of the world’s certified nurses.

International Day of Happiness is a day dedicated to the recognition and celebration of joy and contentment. It is a time to recognize the importance of mental and emotional health, and to find ways to spread the feelings of happiness in our own communities. So be sure to spread some cheer on this special day!

National Fragrance Day is celebrated every year and is a great opportunity to appreciate your favorite scent! Whether it's a floral, musky, earthy, or fruity aroma, take some time to explore and enjoy these aromas - your nose may just thank you!

International Day of the Seal celebrates seals all over the world for their unique place in the environment. It is an opportunity to raise awareness about seals and the threats they face, and to focus on conservation efforts to protect seals and their habitats.

National Puppy Day is a day dedicated to celebrating the unconditional love that puppies bring to our lives. It is a day devoted to appreciating puppies, from fostering puppies in need of homes to taking puppy naps with beloved furry friends. Celebrate the joy and happiness puppies bring and give them the recognition they deserve!

National Cheesesteak Day celebrates the gooey goodness of Philly's favorite sandwich! Celebrate the iconic dish's many incarnations -- steak and cheese, veggie or even vegan! Enjoy a traditional Cheesesteak or try something new, however you choose to celebrate National Cheesesteak Day is sure to be delicious!

International Waffle Day is today! On this day, people around the world enjoy and appreciate the delicious breakfast treat. From classic Belgian waffles to denser Scandinavian varieties, it's the perfect way to celebrate spring and indulge your sweet tooth. So grab a waffle and enjoy!

Purple Day is a worldwide annual event that aims to promote epilepsy awareness, advocacy and education. It was started by a young Canadian girl in 2008 and has since grown into an international awareness day to help de-stigmatize epilepsy and show support to those living with the condition.

National Joe Day celebrates the beloved name of "Joe"! Today, take time to bond with your friends, family, and coworkers named Joe. This humorous holiday is also a great excuse to share coffee or tea to honor the day. Whether you know a Joe or not, join in the celebration with good vibes and fun!

National Black Forest Cake Day is the perfect excuse to indulge in the sweet, decadent flavours of this scrumptious cake! Enjoy a slice of the traditional German dessert, made with layers of chocolate cake, cream, and cherries. A tasty treat sure to make any day a special one!

Manatee Appreciation Day is a day to celebrate these incredible animals. On this day, we recognize manatees and their key role in the environment. We also raise awareness of the need to protect them from threats like pollution and habitat destruction. Let’s come together to show our love and appreciation for manatees.

holiday_name: Grass is Always Browner on the Other Side of the Fence Day
holiday_email: Grass is Always Browner on the Other Side of the Fence Day is an opportunity to appreciate the grass you have. Take a moment to look around and be grateful for what you have. This day encourages optimism in life's little green spaces.

Dance Marathon Day is an annual event celebrating the hard work of students and their commitment to helping local charities. Beginning with a grueling 26-hour marathon, participants raise funds through sponsorships, raffles, and activities. Teamwork, resilience, and fun come together to make it a rewarding experience that will stay with you for a lifetime.

Celebrate National Girlfriend Day today! It's a time to recognize and show appreciation for the special bond between girlfriends and to treat your special lady to something special. Use this day to express your love, devotion, and affection to your special someone.

National Coloring Book Day is a fun day for all ages! Celebrate by enjoying a day of creative fun and relaxation. Spend quality time with your family and friends by sitting down together and letting your imaginations run wild! Make original creations and explore your inner artist.

National Grab Some Nuts Day is a day to celebrate the crunchy, yummy goodness of nuts! Most nut varieties are packed with vitamins, proteins, and other essential nutrients, so why not treat yourself and grab some nuts on National Grab Some Nuts Day? Enjoy a handful of your favorite type, alone or incorporated into delicious recipes!

Celebrate National Chocolate Chip Cookie Day today! Enjoy soft, chewy, and delicious cookies with everyone’s favorite ingredient - chocolate chips! Make it the best day ever with this classic treat and share it with friends and family. Find recipes, activities, and ideas online to help you make the perfect chocolate chip cookie.

Work Like a Dog Day is an annual holiday that honors the effort and diligence of hardworking people all over the world. Celebrate by committing yourself to a day of diligence and productivity! Whether you’re going to work, taking care of household chores, or running errands, make it a day of taking pride in the effort you invest in your activities.

National Root Beer Float Day celebrates the classic summer treat of root beer and ice cream. This classic combination has been a favorite for over a century. Celebrate this day by gathering a group of friends, grabbing some root beer and vanilla ice cream, and making your own root beer float. Enjoy National Root Beer Float Day this summer!

Celebrate the start of summer with Beach Party Day! Sun, fun, and sand await you with activities like sunbathing, beach volleyball, ocean swimming, and more. Join us for an unforgettable day of cannonballs and ocean breezes!

Celebrate International Cat Day! Whether you have a cuddly companion or prefer to admire cats from afar, this day honors the feline species. Show your love for cats in many ways - cuddle with your pet, donate to animal rescue, or just appreciate our furry friends!

National Book Lovers Day is a day to celebrate all things books. Whether you’re an avid reader or a book lover, everyone can come together to appreciate the power of books and the joy they bring to our lives. From reading aloud to going to the library, there’s no better time than National Book Lovers Day to get lost in a great story.

National Bowling Day is a celebration of one of America's favorite pastimes! Every year, millions of people go "bowling for fun" in alleys and homes across the nation. Enjoy a strike-filled day at the alley with family, friends, or coworkers for a great way to commemorate the holiday!

holiday_name: National Play in the Sand Day
holiday_email: National Play in the Sand Day is a special day to get outside and appreciate the awesomeness of sand. Build sandcastles, have a beach picnic, and find seashells. Let the fun of this beloved children's activity create memories that will last a lifetime!

World Elephant Day is an annual event held each year to bring attention to the urgent plight of Asian and African elephants. It aims to create awareness of the beauty and importance of these majestic creatures and the dangers they face due to human activities like poaching, habitat destruction, and conflict. Together, let's protect and preserve these amazing animals!

International Lefthanders Day is celebrated every year to recognize the uniqueness and challenges of left-handed people. It is a day to raise awareness of the special needs of left-handed people and support them in living full and productive lives. From being a small movement to an international event, International Lefthanders Day is a day to embrace the left-handed and make the world more left-friendly!

National Financial Awareness Day is an opportunity to focus on building healthy financial habits. It is the perfect time to review your finances, create a budget, and learn how to best manage your money. Take this day to make sure you are on the path to a secure financial future.

National Relaxation Day is an an annual holiday that encourages everyone to take a break from their daily activities! Spend it however you choose, but make sure you take some time for yourself and chill out. Relaxation helps reduce stress for a healthier life.

Celebrate your carefree summer style with Hawaiian Shirt Day! From bright colors and bold patterns, everyone can have a little aloha spirit. Whether you pull out your best Hawaiian shirt or simply bring the spirit of the islands with you, it's an  effortless way to brighten any day. Hang loose and live aloha!

National Black Cat Appreciation Day celebrates the beauty and resilience of black cats. Held each year, today is a time to recognize the unique characteristics of black cats, as well as the stigma and superstitions sometimes unfairly associated with them. It's a day to honor and appreciate the loving creatures worthy of a forever home.

Never Give Up Day is an annual celebration of resilience and perseverance. It encourages us to keep pushing toward our goals, no matter how daunting they may seem. Celebrated annually on the last Monday of April, Never Give Up Day reminds us to remain determined and to never give up on our dreams.

Celebrate National Potato Day today! Enjoy this versatile vegetable in all its forms with family and friends. From classic mashed potatoes to the perfect french fry, make sure to honour the importance of potatoes in our lives!

National Bacon Lover's Day is an annual special day to celebrate and enjoy the savory, smoky goodness of the world's favorite cured meat. Celebrate with bacon-inspired dishes, snacks, and recipes to make bacon lovers everywhere very, very happy.

Internet Self-Care Day is a day to take a break from the online world and prioritize self-care. Take a break from social media and turn off notifications to re-connect with yourself, practice mindful activities, and appreciate the present moment. Move your laptop aside and spend a day on taking care of you!

Eat a Peach Day is an international day of celebration dedicated to the beloved juicy fruit! Enjoy the deliciousness of peaches by baking a pie, making a smoothie, or just savoring one that is just perfectly ripe. Eat a Peach Day reminds us to savor the sweetness nature has given us!

National Ride the Wind Day celebrates the art and beauty of flying kites! On April 15th, people all around the world take to the skies to fly kites of all shapes and sizes. Soak in the sun, impress your friends, and enjoy the thrill of controlling something that's not on the ground!

International Strange Music Day is an annual event celebrating innovative, experimental, and unconventional musical forms. On this day, music fans get together to celebrate music from all genres that explore the strange and wonderful sounds of the world. To join in the festivities, make sure to check out some strange music and find a unique way to celebrate.

National Banana Split Day celebrates the delicious summer treat! Today, treat yourself to a banana split, a classic combination of ripe banana, chocolate, strawberries, vanilla ice cream, and a dollop of whipped cream. Nothing screams summer like a banana split and the perfect end to National Banana Split Day!

Make Your Own Luck Day is a day to celebrate the power of self-determination and taking initiative. On this day, we seize opportunities and create our own luck by working hard and believing in ourselves. Make Your Own Luck Day encourages us to be proactive in reaching our goals and ambitions.

National Just Because Day is a day to celebrate and appreciate just because moments! Make someone's day special with a small gesture, a kind word, or a thoughtful act. It's time to celebrate the little things and find joy in the everyday.

National Bow Tie Day is a day of celebration for the sartorially inclined! Wearing a bow tie on this day is a way to embrace style and sophistication, while also raising awareness for the importance of expressing unique personalities with individual fashion. Celebrate by donning a bowtie and sharing your style with the world! #NationalBowTieDay.

National Lemon Juice Day celebrates the tart and tangy taste of lemon juice! Enjoy this sunny citrus in recipes, drinks or snacks throughout the day. From lemonade to dressings, this sweet and sour fruit has many uses to liven up meals!

National Toasted Marshmallow Day is a sweet celebration that commemorates the delightful flavor of roasted marshmallows. It's a great time to gather around the campfire, roast marshmallows, and share in the joy of toasty and melty sweet treats. Join in today and toast your marshmallows with those you love!

Eat Outside Day is a chance for everyone to enjoy the great outdoors and celebrate the joy of eating in the fresh air. Whether it's a picnic in the park with family and friends, a backyard barbecue, or a romantic dinner al fresco, get out and enjoy some tasty food with an outdoor view!

National Go Barefoot Day is an annual event celebrated today. It encourages people to cast away their shoes and socks and enjoy being barefoot. Rejuvenate your feet, connect with nature, and express your freedom - celebrate National Go Barefoot Day!

National Donut Day is a special day dedicated to the classic pastry treat! Get ready to enjoy your favourite donuts and indulge in a little sweetness. Whether you enjoy a classic glazed, a jelly-filled delight, or even a vegan option - Today is your excuse to indulge.

National Egg Day is an annual celebration of one of the most versatile ingredients there is! An incredibly nutritious and economical source of protein, eggs come in many shapes, sizes and varieties, making them the perfect addition to any breakfast, lunch or dinner. So grab some eggs and celebrate National Egg Day!

National Cheese Day is an annual celebration of all the delicious things cheese has to offer. Held on June 4th, people get to enjoy all kinds of cheese-related treats, from gourmet cheese platters to cheesy dishes like mac and cheese. No matter what your favorite type or flavor of cheese is, there's something for everyone to celebrate National Cheese Day!

Hot Air Balloon Day is an opportunity to soak up the stunning sights of illuminated balloons gently floating across the sky. Enjoy the gentle sway of a hot air balloon ride and take in majestic or far-reaching views unlike anything else. An experience not to be missed!

National Yo-Yo Day is an annual event that celebrates the iconic toy. This day honors the skill and artistry of yo-yoing and commemorates the culture, history, and tradition it has brought. Today, the world comes together to show their appreciation to the yo-yo and its masters.

National Running Day is an annual event designed to celebrate the sport of running and encourage people of all ages and abilities to lace up their sneakers and get moving. Whether you're a seasoned marathoner or just starting to enjoy running, National Running Day is the perfect day to embrace the joy of running. #NationalRunningDay

National Best Friends Day celebrates the strong bonds of friendship. Fellowships between friends are an important part of life, and this day honors people who appreciate and support one another. Show your best friend how much they are appreciated on National Best Friends Day!

International Dark 'n Stormy Day is a celebration of the much-loved summer cocktail. The day encourages people to raise a glass of this classic concoction – made with dark rum, ginger beer, and lime – and fans from all over come together to share the experiences that makes it oh-so-special. Cheers!

Today is National Iced Tea Day - the perfect excuse to sip one of your favourite chilled beverages! Whether it's black, green, herbal, sweet, or fruity, an ice-cold glass of tea is the perfect way to beat the summer heat and quench your thirst!

holiday_name: National Corn on the Cob Day
holiday_email: National Corn on the Cob Day is an annual celebration of everyone's favorite summertime treat. This day is all about savoring the flavor of the sweet, juicy kernels and celebrating the warm days of summer. So grab your bib, butter, and salt – and let's all indulge in a delicious corn fest!
National Peanut Butter Cookie Day is a holiday for peanut butter enthusiasts and bakers alike! Enjoy fresh-baked peanut butter cookies, honoring the beloved combination of peanut butter and sugar.

Celebrate National Sewing Machine Day! This day honors all types of sewing machines, from manual machines to modern electronic models, and the people who create stunning works of art with them. Let's all get together to recognize the importance of this traditional craft!

International Bath Day is today! It's a time to appreciate the relaxing power of a hot bath and to thank those who are part of the process, from the plumbing engineers to the bathproduct makers. Let's take a soak and enjoy our well-deserved baths!

International Surfing Day is an annual celebration of all things surfing! It is celebrated across the world, from beach parties to organized surf jams. Millions of surfers come together to honor the amazing sport that brings people of all backgrounds together. Join in on the fun and celebrate International Surfing Day!

Fresh Veggies Day is your chance to enjoy delicious, locally-sourced vegetables—straight from the farm! Get ready to enjoy an abundance of fresh produce, from exotic fruits to traditional root vegetables. Whether it’s for a meal or a snack, your meal options just got brighter. So come join us and relish in an incredible selection of fresh goodies, perfect for the season!

Global Garbage Man Day celebrates the essential job of waste management workers. From municipal trash collectors to recyclers, our garbage men and women help keep our environment clean. It's a day to recognize their hard work and thank them for their service! #globalgarbagemanday

International Picnic Day is an annual event celebrated around the world today. It is an opportunity for friends and family to come together, enjoy nature, and share food with one another in a peaceful environment. So grab your favorite snacks, grab your friends, and join the world to celebrate International Picnic Day!

Celebrate National Martini Day today! Put on your fanciest dress or most dashing suit and enjoy a delicious martini -- shaken, not stirred! Whether you prefer a classic martini or something more adventurous, don't forget to raise a toast to the classic cocktail.

Ugliest Dog Day celebrates the world's fugliest furry friends. Every year, the ugliest pup is crowned the winner! It's a humorous event that reminds us all that beauty is in the eye of the beholder. Who's the ugliest of them all?

Celebrate yourself! Today is National Selfie Day! Snap a selfie and share it on social media using the hashtag #NationalSelfieDay. Take a pic of yourself showing off a new look, favorite outfit or just a smile, and share it to celebrate beautiful you!

National Onion Ring Day gives us a chance to celebrate one of America's favorite fried foods! Onion rings are a tasty treat enjoyed with burgers, sandwiches, and other delicious dishes. Celebrate and indulge in this crispy, savory, crunchy snack on July onion ring day!

holiday_name: National Eat at a Food Truck Day
holiday_email: Celebrate National Eat at a Food Truck Day by trying out one of your local tasty treats! Sample dishes from around the world - tacos, bao, kebabs and more - all in the comfort and convenience of your own neighbourhood.

Swim a Lap Day celebrates the power of swimming and encourages everyone to take the plunge! Join us by jumping in the pool and conquering at least one lap. Let's show the world that swimming is an essential, enjoyable activity.

Color TV Day celebrates the day that color television broadcasting began in the US. It marked the dawn of a new era of entertainment, offering vibrant, full-color programming for viewers to enjoy in their living rooms. We celebrate today by tuning in to our favorite shows in beautiful color.

Forgiveness Day is an annual celebration that encourages people to forgive others and to apologize for wrongdoings. It provides an opportunity to reconcile past hurts and release negative emotions in order to move forward without blame or guilt. Celebrating Forgiveness Day provides a chance to heal relationships and start living healthier, happier lives.

National Bingo Day is an annual celebration of the classic game. Come together with friends and family to mark the day with a game, and enjoy the nostalgia, competition, and fun that bingo brings. Join in the fun today and play bingo!

National Tapioca Day is a day to celebrate the wonders of tapioca! This unique starchy food can be used in puddings, added to bubble tea, or even served with grilled meats. Enjoy this special day by making tapioca-filled recipes or trying a new tapioca-inspired dish. Get creative and savor the unique sweetness of tapioca!

National Handshake Day is celebrated annually on this day. It celebrates the importance of human connection and the power of a handshake. This day serves as an opportunity to recognize the significance of trust, respect, and goodwill that comes with a handshake. Celebrate National Handshake Day and make your mark in the world with a simple, meaningful gesture!

International Asteroid Day is an annual global event to raise awareness of asteroids, their impact on Earth, and how we can protect our planet. It provides a platform for public outreach, inspiring people to learn more about asteroids and space exploration. #AsteroidDay
